extendedInfo.description: DB Browser is an Android app of type DB Manager; Gain easy access to the SQLite Data Bases of the apps in any Android deviceInsert, Edit, Delete, Update rows in the Databases, check what are they using, you can obtain information during the develop of your own app,Execute a sql query or see all data in a table with one touch, view the SQLite Data Base structure (views, indexes, tables and triggers),   English-Spanish Support,The devices with root user can access to all the Databases, without root is posible to modify Data Bases inside the SD Card

reviews.title: Simply Awesome. Excellent Table View.
reviews.comment: Just enough features to be practical, and no filler. After using the sqlite3 command line tool for so long first, i really appreciate the formatted table data.  Highly recommended to complement sqlite3 binary. Thank you!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Tried quite a lot, and this one takes the prize. Especially useful on rooted devices. Ps: for those that can\'t figure it out, go to connections and leave the search box empty to find all db\'s.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useless on razr
reviews.comment: As many others stated, it just doesn\'t work on my phone. No databases listed, no databases searchable. I have root access and program has permissions, it just doesn\'t work.
reviews.author: Daniel Bayer

reviews.title: eaay to use
reviews.comment: i wasnt able to view my backup which was in .db file format. this app made it possible to view my backups store as .db formats and saved me a lot of data! thank you! it would be nice to have an option to copy specific data from a particular row. look forward to future updates! :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useless, I\'m Afraid.
reviews.comment: I installed this for its root-access.  Sadly, I can\'t open _any_ DBs.  This app has no file browser; instead, you \"search\" for the DB using ... um ... it\'s never made clear what the search is for.  Even entering in the full filename of the DB to open would be better than this useless search nonsense!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It helped me out
reviews.comment: Easy program to use. I was able to modify some settings that I needed to without having to buy another app. Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: For a free utility I can\'t  complain. It is fast and clean.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Crashes on my most interesting table but gave good insight on other tables. Very slow. Guess it doesn\'t use a cursorAdapter but an array adapter.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Difficult to use, but it worked
reviews.comment: Did not recognize any dbs on my rooted droid.  Had to run a search for the db name and was able to find it that way and the db update worked.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great on rooted bionic
reviews.comment: Works well once you understand how things work.  I found, opened, and edited a settings.db.  Loses 1/2 star for sparce guidance & UI.  People who rate it poorly are confused.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good start
reviews.comment: But UI needs serious work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Simple & Cool
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No databases.
reviews.comment: Manages to get root permissions, but doesn\'t find any app databases. Entirely useless, I\'m afraid.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Couldn\'t locate DB
reviews.comment: Rooted but search never found DBs. Frustrated.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Its easy to use.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: wow
reviews.comment: The bomb very good with database properties, viewing etc good database manager
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Do not work as expected
reviews.comment: The APP can\'t locate any database.
reviews.author: Micael Carvalho

reviews.comment: Useless application
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Helpful for testing
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very Useful
reviews.comment: Would be nice if there was a way to browse through the records of a table using a text box search of some kind  (instead of having to enter a query every time like \"Select * from [table] where [column] like \'%searchtext%\' ) ... But this app is still a huge help to me.
reviews.author: A Google User
